Title: The Darkest Minds
Genre: Action, Adventure, Drama, Romance, Sci-Fi, Thriller
Writer: Chad Hodge (screenplay by), Alexandra Bracken (based upon the novel by)
Actors: Amandla Stenberg, Mandy Moore, Bradley Whitford, Harris Dickinson
Plot: Imprisoned by an adult world that now fears everyone under 18, a group of teens form a resistance group to fight back and reclaim control of their future.
